statements: SELECT * FROM data_aggregation
SELECT id, date, sales_amount FROM data_aggregation WHERE product_category = 'Electronics'
SELECT product_category, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM data_aggregation GROUP BY product_category
SELECT * FROM data_aggregation ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT region, AVG(sales_amount) AS average_sales FROM data_aggregation WHERE date > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY region
SELECT * FROM data_aggregation WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, date, sales_amount, region FROM data_aggregation WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY sales_amount DESC, date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM data_aggregation WHERE region = 'West';
SELECT product_category, AVG(sales_amount) AS average_sales FROM data_aggregation GROUP BY product_category HAVING AVG(sales_amount) > 5000 ORDER BY average_sales DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT date FROM data_aggregation WHERE region = 'East' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM dataset_table;
SELECT dataset_name, dataset_size FROM dataset_table WHERE dataset_size > 100;
SELECT DISTINCT dataset_name FROM dataset_table ORDER BY dataset_name DESC;
SELECT dataset_name, dataset_size, created_date FROM dataset_table WHERE created_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT aggregation_method, summary_result FROM aggregation_table ORDER BY summary_result DESC;
SELECT id, dataset_name FROM dataset_table WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM dataset_table WHERE dataset_size > 1000 ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT aggregation_id, aggregation_method, summary_result FROM aggregation_table WHERE aggregation_method = 'mean';
SELECT dataset_name, created_date FROM dataset_table WHERE created_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT dt.dataset_name, at.aggregation_method, at.summary_result FROM dataset_table dt INNER JOIN aggregation_table at ON dt.id=at.dataset_id WHERE dt.dataset_size < 500;
SELECT * FROM dataset WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, value FROM dataset WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT date, value, name FROM dataset WHERE value > 100.0;
SELECT id, name, date, value FROM dataset WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT name, value FROM dataset WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM dataset WHERE id = 1
SELECT id, name, value FROM dataset ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT date, value FROM dataset WHERE id IN (2, 4)
SELECT DISTINCT name FROM dataset WHERE value > 100
SELECT id FROM dataset WHERE name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT name, email FROM Customer WHERE registration_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM Order ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT o.order_id, p.name, oi.quantity FROM Order o JOIN OrderItem oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN Product p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Customer ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM Order WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' AND total_amount > 1000;
SELECT name, category, price FROM Product WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT c.name AS customer_name, p.name AS product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price FROM OrderItem oi JOIN Customer c ON oi.order_id = c.customer_id JOIN Product p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT c.name AS customer_name, COUNT(o.order_id) AS num_orders FROM Customer c LEFT JOIN Order o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id GROUP BY c.name HAVING num_orders > 3 ORDER BY num_orders DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM customers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT description, insight_date FROM insights WHERE insight_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM customers WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, order_date FROM customers c INNER JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id INNER JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT description, insight_date FROM insights WHERE insight_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
